title: Skin bug?
body:
So I had my cottontail skin on ready to go in game, I don't remember what happened but somehow I loaded into game as.. 

"Happy elf teemo"
http://img.prntscr.com/img?url=http://i.imgur.com/LOMNNYQ.jpg

Idk if I can re-create it with the new Champion select, but I shouldn't have this skin..

replies.body:
Hey Onastacia,

Thanks for the report! We're in the process of investigating this issue.

I saw another post on it, I didn't post all the info when it happened.. but apparently me and this other person got it, when we switched champions with someone.. 

I tried t recreate it this game, switched with a friend, but I didn't get a random skin this time.  Idk what happened but it did not give free skins. Only get it for the one game.
